name: educere
description: Educere web application system is a repository of 100+ educational resources of CS and IT-based to help users in finding the perfect materials that suits their needs in a streamline way. The contents are generated from Educere Scrapper Python script (see the other project [here](https://github.com/mirulh/Educere_Scrapper)).

scripts.build: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && npm run build
